uk.ac.ebi.gxa.analytics.compute
Class AtlasComputeService

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ebi.gxa.analytics.compute.AtlasComputeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Compute
public class AtlasComputeService
extends Object
implements Compute

Provides access to R computational infrastructure via an AtlasRFactory. To use, pass a ComputeTask to the method computeTask(ComputeTask), the return type is determined by the type parameter to ComputeTask.

For example: 

 RNumeric i = computeService.computeTask(new ComputeTask () {
   public compute(RServices R) throws RemoteException {
     return (RNumeric) R.getObject("1 + 3");
   }
 );

Author:
Misha Kapushesky, Tony Burdett

computeTask

public <T> T computeTask(ComputeTask<T> task)
              throws ComputeException
Executes task on a borrowed worker. Returns type specified in generic type parameter T to the method.

Specified by:
computeTask in interface Compute
Type Parameters:

Parameters:
